stimulusHtml: The image is best understood in the context of which of the following developments during the Renaissance?

features.html:
Refer to the image below.

Albrecht Dürer, Self-Portrait, 1500

Bridgeman Images

The inscription reads: “I, Albrecht Dürer of Nuremberg painted myself thus, with undying colors, in my twenty-eighth year.”

choicesHtml: The emergence of Mannerist and Baroque artistic styles
The development of cultural expressions that reflected nationalist values
The revival of Greek and Roman classical styles
The growth of individualist humanism in artistic expression
